name: the universe, i think
description:
Create the universe! create a star to win! (you would have had to add sun and earth, but ran out of time)

This is a small little  game made for Ludum Dare 45: Start with nothing.
In this game, inspired by Bill Wurtz's "History of the entire world, i guess" you must throw space stuff together so they make even crazier space stuff.

Made in 72 hours for the jam. 
Intro audio by bill wurtz - "history of the entire world , i guess"
